roleset.name: conduct a preliminary screening (weeding out) process

role.descr: original group the sorting process is applied to
screened for what quality, subgroup, characterisitc

example.name: prescreen-v
example.text: Very disappointed in Kitchen Aid as well , I thought that they pre-screened their vendors for price and quality of work , obviously they do not !
example.arg: for price and quality of work

roleset.note: PRESCREEN-V NOTES: Added for Julia for EWT.
